page:content.p: At this moment, there's no English development documentation. If you speak Spanish, you can take a look to the Spanish development documentation in the wiki.

It'll pass some time before some English documentation exists (apart from API documentation). This is due to the fact that this project is being developed as my final year project and, sadly, I must do the documentation in Spanish. I have no time to make the English documentation at the same time I do the Spanish one, but when I've some free time, I'll begin to translate it (at least, the most important parts).
Still in planning stage. However, coding will begin very soon.
You can check UML Diagrams in the wiki. They're in the Spanish section, but as code is made in English, you'll be able to understand them (I hope so ;) ).

page:content.p: Please, note that this roadmap can (and, in fact, I bet you that it will) change over time. It's only an orientation for myself, and it's not written in stone, so it'll likely evolve as needed.

ul.li:
0.1:
Resource implementation for local files.
Basic package status.
Very basic working tasks: extract, configure, build and install.
Implementations: zip/gz/bz2, GNU configure, Make, Make install.
They won't use even the configuration.
Take only default parameters.
Install and uninstall modules.
Simple console interface for installer.

0.2:
TaskLogger and TaskProgress.
TaskLogger observers.
TaskProgress observers.
Simple KDE GUI for installer.

0.3:
Working configuration parameter set.
Saving and loading configuration from XML.
Add types to configuration parameters (boolean, int, float, string, path).
Add configuration to tasks.
Use given configuration.
Tasks must provide information of their needed parameters.
Generic widget for configuration.

0.4:
Add working package profiles.
Auto-registering of tasks and task implementations.
KDE Manager GUI to install and uninstall packages.

0.5:
Update module.
Add updates support to KDE Manager GUI.

0.6:
Overridable default configuration for tasks.
Set default configuration for tasks.

0.7:
Add new tasks: check for updates, create menu entries, download package from internet.
Implementations: sf.net RSS/berlios.de RSS, freedesktop specification, url/page of project.

0.8:
Add new task: dependency solve.
Implementations: urpmi.
